extracted_entities.name: Conceptual and Technical Engineering of Blockchain-based Information Systems

organizers: Prof. Sarah Bouraga, Ph.D. - EM Normandie Business School, France
Dr. Felix Härer, Ph.D. - FHNW University of Applied Sciences, Switzerland

submission_information: Manuscripts must be submitted electronically through Editorial Manager®.
Select article type 'VSI: BISs - Research article' or 'VSI: BISs - Review article'.
Prepare manuscripts according to the 'Guide for Authors' of the Information Systems journal.
